Forum More from YDF YDF Crafters Forum Make Your Own Jibbitz (Crocs Shoe Charms)
If this is your first visit, be sure to check out the FAQ by clicking the link above. You may have to register before you can post: click the register link above to proceed. To start viewing messages, select the forum that you want to visit from the selection below. + Reply to Thread Results 1 to 6 of 6 Thread: Make Your Own Jibbitz (Crocs Shoe Charms)
Thread Tools
Show Printable Version Subscribe to this Thread…
03-27-2007, 01:13 PM #1 duckbear View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2001 Posts 1,434 Make Your Own Jibbitz (Crocs Shoe Charms) I am by no means a crafty person myself, but I saw this and thought it was a great idea for making your own inexpensive Jibbitz-type charms for holey Crocs-type shoes, so I thought I'd share it here:
http://mylittlemochi.typepad.com/my_...oc_charms.html Last edited by duckbear; 03-27-2007 at 01:15 PM . Reply With Quote 03-27-2007, 01:22 PM #2 Tami4965 View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles chat Join Date Sep 2006 Location Antelope Valley CA Posts 1,555 THANK YOU! I was looking for some JIbbitz yesterday,, this is great I have adorable buttons I could make these out of. Thanks!!! Reply With Quote 03-30-2007, 01:34 PM #3 gretalynn View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Jul 2006 Posts 1,401 That's adorable! Thanks! (I don't have any but have already shared the idea!)
I also had an idea when someone mentioned the Jibbitz wristbands .
You could make one by taking a rubber"awareness"type bracelet, punch holes in it with a single hole punch and use the same things for charms!
Too cute! Reply With Quote 04-17-2007, 05:31 AM #4 lezanac View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Sep 2006 Posts 619 TY This is the cutest thing I'm going to buy some crocs for my girls just to try this out!! Reply With Quote 06-10-2007, 06:06 PM #5 duckbear View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Mar 2001 Posts 1,434 Even more like the real thing...I don't know if the links will work, but if not just go to http://www.orientaltrading.com and search for doodads.
CLOG EMBELLISHMENT DOODADS Item Number: IN-68/45296 $3.95 per Unit 24 items per Unit
http://www.orientaltrading.com/appli...SHMENT+DOODADS
HOW TO CHARM A DOODAD Creating a charmed doodad is easy and fun! Click below for step by step instructions.
http://www.orientaltrading.com/appli...CHARM+A+DOODAD Reply With Quote 11-12-2007, 06:27 PM #6 Charming View Profile View Forum Posts View Blog Entries View Articles Registered User Join Date Nov 2007 Posts 1 Making your own shoe charms, jibbitz for my purse charming There are sooo many things you can make shoe charms from. Use buttons, there are lots of fashion buttons, make them out of Fimo clay, and they sell the doodads to put in your shoes at Michael's craft store. They also sell charms two in a package for 1.99. We're crazy about the charms now that my daughter has the My Purse Charming purse. It is sooo cute. You can change the ribbon and the straps on the purse to match your outfits or holiday themes - it's adorable. My daughter loves to dress her purse up before she goes out! There is a site www.mypursecharming.com , and they have free shipping! I love to spread the word about cool things! Enjoy. Reply With Quote
